title: EaseUS Partition Master 10.2 Technican Edition-TSZ [ATOM]
description:
Description:
EASEUS Partition Master is a comprehensive partition software, which not only provides a comfortable user-interface to simplify your tasks but also enables you to configure and manage partitions of hard disk(s). 

With the help of EASEUS Partition Master you can create and delete partitions on your hard disk quickly and easily. The most attractive feature is that it can resize/move your partitions by using the free spaces.

With EASEUS Partition Master you'll be able to easily manage the space on your hard drives.
It's Best solution to create, delete, resize/move, merge, split, wipe or format partitions to make better use of hard drive capacity.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Extend NTFS system partition without rebooting to maximize PC performance.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Convert dynamic disk to basic disk and convert FAT to NTFS file system.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Convert primary partition to logical partition and vice versa: convert a primary volume to logical to create a fifth volume on a disk with 4 existed primary volumes.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Linux partition management: Easily delete, create, format, recover EXT2/EXT3 partition, etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Create WinPE rescue disk for booting sickly computer.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Speed up your computer by defragmentation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Support all hardware RAID, removable storage device, hard disk, GPT disk and FAT/NTFS/EXT2/EXT3 file system.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Work on both BIOS-based and UEFI-based hardware.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Migrate OS to SSD without reinstalling Windows
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Copy partition with fast file-by-file copy to protect your data.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Clone entire hard disk to another without Windows reinstallation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Upgrade system disk to a bigger one with one-click.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Safely copy dynamic volume to basic disk and resize the basic disk, etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Recover deleted or lost partitions from unallocated space due to any personal, hardware or software failure or virus attack.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Recover deleted or lost partitions after repartitioned hard drive.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Two recovery modes in Partition Recovery Wizard: Automatic recovery mode and Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Manual recovery mode.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Supports FAT, NTFS, EXT2 & EXT3 partition recovery.
